name: Berry (ProjectESPider)
description:
Embark on a small and crunchy adventure up Yamakuu mountain's somewhat treacherous terrain to reach an illumination brighter than any spider has ever achieved. 

Explore over 40 levels and combat multiple bosses while platforming, dodging, and vibing within the world of bugs. Try and consume all the flies hidden throughout the world!

To help you on your adventure, here's a few notes on some of the other entities you may encounter:

∙ spits fire (doesn't actually spit, summons from top of body)
∙ likes to dance
∙ at war with anything that involves ice

∙ incomplete (no wings). how does he fly?
∙ wishes he was in the game
∙ accepts invites to hang out and always regrets it

∙ actually has wings (bee is jealous)
∙ very tasty. 10/10 would recommend
∙ there are exactly 17 of these in this game

∙ cake
∙ for a very special bug
